attributes.action: make the discrimination of people with "ginger hair" an illigal offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you recieved a report of racism in a school (caucasian on afro/afro-carribian) you would address the issue instantly, as racism is a offence punishable by law. however would you react the same at a report of gingerism? 
in racism victims are discriminated due to there skin colour, hair color, and gereral ethnic heratage. is gingerism really different? well gingers have different coloured hair, red, a paler complexion plus a high amount of freckles. ehtnic heratage is a grey area because it is probable any ethnicy could have been breeded out.
so im asking you to address this problem head on, and begin a nationwide campaign to try to prevent specifically gingerist abuse.
